::KitKat::

She heard Sinesis and Sinister wake up and start talking.  She knew 
that those two where trouble.  She sighed and got up from her spot 
under the console. She walked up to the 2 bots. "Hey. You guys up to 
a patrol?  I was going on a perimeter patrol.  Since you guys said 
you were such good assassins, I thought that if we found any maximal 
while on patrol, you could demonstrate your skills to me.  I mean, 
you guys have me curious as to how a real professional assassin does 
it right." She gave them her most sincere smile. "Well, that is if 
you have nothing better to do?"
